snippet: The couple, Matthew and Grace Huang, are accused of starving their 8-year-old daughter to death, but they say the girl had been struggling with an underlying eating disorder.
abstract: Court in Qatar orders temporary release of Matthew and Grace Huang, American couple accused of starving their 8-year-old daughter to death; couple says adopted girl had severe eating disorder.

byline.original: By SHABINA S. KHATRI and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Shabina S. Khatri reported from Doha, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: The couple, Matthew and Grace Huang, are accused of starving their 8-year-old daughter to death, but they say the girl had been struggling with an underlying eating disorder.

headline.main: Qatari Court Orders Temporary Release of American Couple
